about_the_game:
This is the Demo of a work-in-progress game. Please report any bugs you find. Full version is scheduled for release on Windows, Mac and Linux early 2021. Pricing is not confirmed yet.

In It Together is a game about working together to solve problems. The main hook is the two player co-op mode where you and a friend can play through 50 levels designed around co-operation. Additionally there is a single player mode with another set of 50 levels designed to be played alone. If you're more than two players, the full version will also have a battle mode where up to four players can duke it out in competitive matches.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has very mild cartoon violence, and a few gross scenes involving unrealistic aliens losing body parts. There is no blood. There is also a guy smoking a cigar.
